name: part_004
file: tmp_【3D配信】４周年記念ミニライブ【＃ときのそら4周年】 [s7hakOSsU-I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: MC section with Tokino Sora and Hoshimachi Suisei, discussing their history and future.
Transition after Suisei leaves; Sora takes a water break and introduces AZKi.
Performance of the song 'only my railgun'.

subtitles.original: 嬉しいなと思って来ました
subtitles.english: I'm so happy to be here.

subtitles.original: いつでもあんのかな、ここは
subtitles.english: I wonder if it's always like this here.

subtitles.original: 水がね、ひたひたで
subtitles.english: The water is all over the place.

subtitles.original: 滑っちゃうな、それは。滑っちゃうな、それは
subtitles.english: You'll slip like that. Yeah, you'll slip.

subtitles.original: かなり聞いてる。かなり聞いてるって。何を？
subtitles.english: I've heard it a lot. Heard what?

subtitles.original: お、何を？あ、そう、まあでも
subtitles.english: Oh, what? Ah, right, well...

subtitles.original: 我々二人で歌ってみた動画を出してはいるんですよ
subtitles.english: The two of us did release a cover video together.

subtitles.original: それをいっぱい聴いてくれてるのかな？
subtitles.english: I wonder if everyone's been listening to it a lot?

subtitles.original: ぜひ聴いてください、たくさん。聴いてください
subtitles.english: Please listen to it many times. Please do!

subtitles.original: お願いします。そん時は私がそらちゃん誘ったんだけど
subtitles.english: Please. Last time, I was the one who invited Sora-chan.

subtitles.original: 今回はなんとそらちゃんから誘っていただきまして
subtitles.english: But this time, Sora-chan was the one who invited me.

subtitles.original: あー、嬉しいなと思いながら今日は来ました
subtitles.english: I'm so happy to be here today.

subtitles.original: いや、すごいね、すごく快諾して。嘘、嘘、嘘
subtitles.english: Yeah, you agreed immediately. No way!

subtitles.original: あの、これやりたいんだけどスケジュール教えて、みたいな
subtitles.english: "I want to do this, tell me your schedule," she said.

subtitles.original: そう、あ、スケジュール次第で全然行けますけど、みたいな
subtitles.english: And I was like, "I'm totally free depending on the schedule."

subtitles.original: もうすごいあっさり来るじゃんと思って
subtitles.english: I thought, "Wow, she's so casual about it."

subtitles.original: そう、やります！って。大体すいちゃんそうだから
subtitles.english: "I'll do it!" Suisei is usually like that.

subtitles.original: 何かやる？やる！みたいな
subtitles.english: "Wanna do something?" "Yes!"

subtitles.original: ノリがめちゃくちゃいいじゃん。そう、やるって
subtitles.english: You have such a great vibe. Yeah, let's do it!

subtitles.original: 今日も軽率な持ち味で、やる！って来ました
subtitles.english: Today too, with my usual lightheartedness, I came here saying "I'll do it!"

subtitles.original: いやでも、そういう気持ちで来てくれるのが一番嬉しい
subtitles.english: But honestly, that enthusiasm makes me the happiest.

subtitles.original: すごく楽しかった。やっぱそらちゃんと一緒に歌えるっていうのは
subtitles.english: It was so much fun. Getting to sing with Sora-chan...

subtitles.original: 我々からしたらもうビッグイベントですからね
subtitles.english: ...is a huge event for us.

subtitles.original: ビッグイベントですからね。ほんとに？
subtitles.english: A huge event! Really?

subtitles.original: そうだよ、そうだよ。なかなかないことですからね。確かにね
subtitles.english: That's right. It doesn't happen very often. True.

subtitles.original: もう4年ですよ、そらちゃん。もう4年
subtitles.english: It's already been 4 years, Sora-chan. 4 years already.

subtitles.original: すいちゃんもだから割と...あ
subtitles.english: Suisei, you've also been around for a while...

subtitles.original: そう、割とでも近いよね。近いよね
subtitles.english: Yeah, our timing is actually quite close. It is.

subtitles.original: 私が来年の3月で4年だから。そうだよね
subtitles.english: My 4th anniversary will be next March. That's right.

subtitles.original: そう、半年ないくらいな差かな。半年差
subtitles.english: So there's less than a six-month difference.

subtitles.original: あ、半年差か、ぐらい。
subtitles.english: About a six-month gap, then.

subtitles.original: いやでもさ、そんなに経った感じする？
subtitles.english: But does it feel like that much time has passed?

subtitles.original: しない。しない。しない、全く。全然しないよね
subtitles.english: No. Not at all. It doesn't feel like it at all.

subtitles.original: そうなんだよ。みんなもさ、そうじゃない？
subtitles.english: Exactly. I bet it's the same for everyone else too.

subtitles.original: あんまりそんなに経った感じないよね、きっと。うん
subtitles.english: It probably doesn't feel like that much time has passed.

subtitles.original: そうかも。初期からね、追ってるそらとものみんなは
subtitles.english: Maybe. For the Soratomos who've been following since the start...

subtitles.original: もう4年か、って。そんなに経ったんだ、って
subtitles.english: ...they must be thinking, "It's already been 4 years?"

subtitles.original: みんなあれじゃない？月日の速さにびっくりしちゃってんじゃなかろうか
subtitles.english: Everyone's probably surprised by how fast time flies.

subtitles.original: そうかもね。いやでもさ、
subtitles.english: Maybe. But you know...

subtitles.original: やっぱ4年前の一番最初の頃と比べて、今はこんな大きなステージに
subtitles.english: ...compared to 4 years ago, being on such a big stage now...

subtitles.original: 環境とかはすごい変わってるけど。うん。
subtitles.english: The environment has changed a lot, hasn't it?

subtitles.original: なんていうの、もう考え方とか大して変わってないんだよね
subtitles.english: But my way of thinking hasn't really changed much.

subtitles.original: そっかそっか。なんかね、ずっとずっと、こんな感じで
subtitles.english: I see. You've always been like this.

subtitles.original: のらりくらりと。このままね、
subtitles.english: Just taking it easy. And like this...

subtitles.original: 10年、20年と続けていければいいなと思うね。うん
subtitles.english: I hope to continue for another 10 or 20 years.

subtitles.original: これからも頑張っていただきたい、そらちゃんには
subtitles.english: I want Sora-chan to keep doing her best.

subtitles.original: いや、すいちゃんもでしょ。私ももちろん頑張りますけれども
subtitles.english: You too, Suisei! Of course, I'll do my best too.

subtitles.original: これからも、5年目も6年目も7年目も8年目も
subtitles.english: From now on, for the 5th, 6th, 7th, 8th year...

subtitles.original: めっちゃ噛んでる。9年目もずっとずっと頑張っていってください
subtitles.english: You're stumbling over your words! And for the 9th year too...

subtitles.original: 頑張ります。お互い頑張ろう。うん、頑張ろう
subtitles.english: I will! Let's both do our best! Yeah!

subtitles.original: 先輩！先輩！
subtitles.english: Senpai! Senpai!

subtitles.original: というわけで、2人目のゲスト、星街すいせいちゃんでした！
subtitles.english: So, our second guest was Hoshimachi Suisei-chan!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！またねー！
subtitles.english: Yay! See you later!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: では、次に行きたいんですが、一回お水を飲みます
subtitles.english: I'd like to move on to the next part, but first, a water break.

subtitles.original: はい、というわけで、次はAZKiと一緒に歌を歌っていきます
subtitles.english: All right, next I'll be singing a song with AZKi.

subtitles.original: それも2人で歌うのは初めての曲です
subtitles.english: This is also a song we've never sung together before.

subtitles.original: only my railgun！
subtitles.english: only my railgun!

subtitles.original: 一緒に歌おう！行くぞ！
subtitles.english: Let's sing together! Let's go!

subtitles.original: 放て! 心に刻んだ夢を 未来さえ置き去りにして
subtitles.english: Release it! The dream carved in my heart, leaving even the future behind

subtitles.original: 限界など知らない 意味無い! この力が光散らす
subtitles.english: I don't know any limits, it's meaningless! This power scatters light

subtitles.original: その先に遥かな想いを
subtitles.english: Beyond that, distant feelings

subtitles.original: 歩いてきた この道を
subtitles.english: Having walked this path

subtitles.original: 振り返ることしか
subtitles.english: If I can only look back

subtitles.original: できないなら 今ここで
subtitles.english: If I can't do anything else, then right here

subtitles.original: 全てを壊せる
subtitles.english: I can destroy everything

subtitles.original: 暗闇に落ちる街並み
subtitles.english: Streets falling into darkness

subtitles.original: 人はどこまで立ち向かえるの?
subtitles.english: How far can people stand up to it?

subtitles.original: 加速するその痛みから
subtitles.english: From that accelerating pain

subtitles.original: 誰かをきっと守れるよ
subtitles.english: I can surely protect someone

subtitles.original: Looking the blitz loop this planet to search way.
subtitles.english: Looking the blitz loop this planet to search way.

subtitles.original: Only my railgun can shoot it. 今すぐ
subtitles.english: Only my railgun can shoot it. Right now

subtitles.original: 身体中を 光の速さで駆け巡った 確かな予感
subtitles.english: A sure premonition that coursed through my body at the speed of light

subtitles.original: 掴め! 望むものなら残さず 輝ける自分らしさで
subtitles.english: Seize it! If it's what you want, leave nothing behind with your own shining self

subtitles.original: 信じてるよ あの日の誓いを この瞳に光る涙
subtitles.english: I believe in that day's vow, the tears shining in these eyes

subtitles.original: それさえも強さになるから
subtitles.english: Even that will become strength
